headline: PCA (PKG) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Good morning, everyone, and thank you all for participating in Packaging Corporation of America's Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Conference Call today.  Yesterday, we reported second quarter net income of $242 million or $2.67 per share.  Excluding the special items, second quarter 2025 net income was $224 million or $2.48 per share compared to the second quarter of 2024 net income of $199 million or $2.20 per share.

headline: PCA (PKG) Q3 2024 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Mark Kowlzan: Thank you, Jamie.  Good morning, everyone, and thank you all for participating in Packaging Corporation of America's third quarter 2024 earnings release conference call.  With me on the call today is Tom Hassfurther, Executive Vice President, who runs our packaging business, and Bob Mundy, our Chief Financial Officer.

headline: Did PKG’s Containerboard Price Hike Just Shift Packaging Corporation of America’s (PKG) Investment Narrative?
summary: Packaging Corporation of America recently announced a US$70 per ton price increase for containerboard, effective March 1, aiming to support margins amid soft demand and tight labor conditions. This move is material not just for Packaging Corporation of America but for the broader containerboard industry, as it signals potential pricing power and margin support across key competitors. We will now examine how this containerboard price increase may influence Packaging Corporation of America’s...

headline: PCA is first major containerboard producer with price increase in 2026
summary: Analysts expected at least one increase this year as operating rates rise following a 10% capacity pullback in North America. Cascades also announced an increase for corrugating medium in December.

headline: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE:PKG) will be announcing earnings results this Tuesday after the bell. Here’s what to expect.
